name: translucently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that allows light to pass through in an attractive way: Each plate contained a portion of almost translucently thin cucumber. Nick looked at me with his translucently pale blue eyes.
More examplesFewer examplesThe sheet of quartz has been worn translucently thin. I enjoyed the translucently wrapped dumplings stuffed with chopped vegetables.Before it is fried, the flesh of the fish appears translucently yellow.The ghost's fingers shone translucently, and I could see the outlines of the narrow bones.
